parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the name of the topmost commanding menu or "" if the menu is closed. For action menu visibility check see [[isActionMenuVisible]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''commandingMenu'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[waitUntil]] {[[commandingMenu]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>==</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> "RscStatus"}; [[hint]] "Press 4, I'm bleeding !";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[commandingMenu]] != "") [[then]] { [[hint]] "Command menu is opened" };</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[showCommandingMenu]], [[isActionMenuVisible]], [[BIS_fnc_addCommMenuItem]], [[BIS_fnc_removeCommMenuItem]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on July 15, 2009 - 12:21 (CEST)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Lou Montana|Lou Montana]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Possible values are :
*'''""''' - means menu is closed
*'''"RscMainMenu"''' - Main menu, by pressing backspace
**'''"RscMoveHigh"''' - Move menu (1)
**'''"#WATCH"''' - Watch menu (2)
***'''"#WATCH0"''' - Watch menu - next page (2-0)
**'''"RscWatchDir"''' - Engage menu (3)
***'''"RscWatchMoreDir"''' - Engage menu - watch a direction (3-8)
**'''"#GET_IN"''' - Mount menu (4)
**'''"RscStatus"''' - Status menu (5)
***'''"RscCallSupport"''' - Mount menu - call support (5-1)
**'''"#ACTION"''' - Action menu (6)
**'''"RscCombatMode"''' - Combat mode menu (7)
**'''"RscFormations"''' - Formation menu(8)
**'''"RscTeam"''' - Team menu (9)
***'''"RscSelectTeam"''' - Team menu - select team (0-5)
**'''"RscReply"''' - Reply menu (0)
***'''"#User:BIS_Menu_GroupCommunication"''' - Communication menu (0-8)
***'''"#CUSTOM_RADIO"''' - Custom sounds menu (0-9)
**'''"RscRadio"''' - Radio menu (0-0)
*'''"RscGroupRootMenu"''' - "simplified" menu

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
